definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: They may contain malicious code with damaging potential.
sentences.chinese: 它們可能包含具有破壞性的惡意代碼。

sentences.english: For example, a hacker could use malicious code to take control of PCs using the software.
sentences.chinese: 例如，黑客可以利用惡意代碼控制使用該軟件的電腦。

sentences.english: The same techniques allow Microsoft to find malicious code that may have been injected in its products.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的技術使得微軟可發現注入其產品的惡意代碼。

sentences.english: In of all kinds and baleful code, trojan virus most " evil ", occupy 39%.
sentences.chinese: 在各類惡意代碼中，木馬病毒最“惡”，佔39%。
